statements: SELECT * FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences;
SELECT lead_id, communication_channel, preferred_hours FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences;
SELECT communication_channel, preference_level FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences WHERE preference_level = 'High';
SELECT lead_id, last_interaction_date FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, preferred_hours FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences WHERE communication_channel = 'Email' AND preferred_hours = 'Morning';
SELECT lead_id, communication_channel FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences WHERE preferred_hours = 'Morning';
SELECT * FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT communication_channel FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences;
SELECT lead_id, preference_level FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences WHERE preference_level IN ('High', 'Medium');
SELECT preferred_hours, COUNT(*) AS channel_count FROM LeadCommunicationPreferences GROUP BY preferred_hours HAVING channel_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM lead_preferences;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM lead_preferences WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM lead_preferences WHERE last_name = 'Doe' AND preference_1 = 'A';
SELECT * FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'call' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, lead_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM lead_interactions WHERE lead_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'email';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM lead_preferences WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lead_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%fruit%' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, count(*) AS total_interactions FROM lead_interactions GROUP BY lead_id HAVING total_interactions > 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, interaction_date FROM lead_preferences JOIN lead_interactions ON lead_preferences.lead_id = lead_interactions.lead_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) FROM leads GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_id > 10 ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM interaction_history;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interaction_history WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM lead_status;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 = TRUE
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interaction_history ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, date_time, message FROM communication_log WHERE user_id = 10 AND date_time > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM lead_status WHERE status = 'Warm'
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, duration_minutes FROM interaction_history WHERE duration_minutes > 30
SELECT * FROM Preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM Interactions;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT user_name, email, phone_number FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, subscribed_date FROM Subscriptions;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM Users;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_datetime, interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type='click';
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM Preferences WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email, phone_number FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
